title: Fingerprint detection stopped working after April 2019 Security Patch
content: Really annoyed with the latest update from Google after which the fingerprint identification has stopped working for me on my new phone. The device is hardly 1.5 month old and suddenly after yesterday night the finger print identification has stopped working. I am not even able to see the setting for Pixel Imprint on the device.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
